title: Conan the Barbarian (1982) Title font?
content:
Because Arnold will soon be out of office, and we'll need some way to celebrate his legacy. /s ;)

There's a nice font called "Ronan" over at MyFonts that's based on this one, but it's from 2006 so not the original.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113055051im_/http:/typophile.com/files/conan3_5363.jpg)
author: Sixagon

comments.content: There is also a [Conan the Barbarian](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113055051/http:/www.conanthegame.com/) RPG game. Overall Conan is a gritty experience that really beckons to God of War with a litlte more gore.
